alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 2:53AM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Idaho and northeast Oregon. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Friday night through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected during the day Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
